alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:16PM EDT until September 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 616 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jacobus, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... York, Red Lion, Spry, Dallastown, Shiloh, East York, Stonybrook-Wilshire, West York, Shrewsbury, Codorus, Grantley and Tyler Run-Queens Gate. This includes Interstate 83 from mile markers 4 to 22. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
